nodes.bodyText: This doesn't apply to pLinux BE, only AIX (although pLinux BE uses gcc for the interpreter).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,23 +21,50 @@
 ################################################################################
 
 omr_add_tracegen(j9vm.tdf)
-j9vm_add_library(j9vm SHARED
-	OUTPUT_NAME j9vm${J9VM_VERSION_SUFFIX}
+
+set(interp_flags_to_remove) # list of flags removed when compiling the interpreter
+set(interp_new_flags) # flags to be added when compiling the interpreter
+
+if(OMR_ARCH_POWER)
+	if(OMR_TOOLCONFIG STREQUAL "xlc")
+		list(APPEND interp_flags_to_remove "-O3")
+		list(APPEND interp_new_flags "-O2" "-qdebug=lincomm:ptranl:tfbagg")

nodes.bodyText: I don't think we support any Linux compiling the interpreter with xlc.

nodes.bodyText:
See above comment about bracket comments.
I decided to leave code in, along with explanation at top of if block,
to closer reflect the uma builds

nodes.bodyText: Can you add a comment to explain the reason for this code to be here, and that it's commented out?  Having that expressed in the code will make it easier to understand in the future

nodes.bodyText: This is commented but the closing ]] aren't.  Am I missing something about the cmake syntax?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,23 +21,54 @@
 ################################################################################
 
 omr_add_tracegen(j9vm.tdf)
-j9vm_add_library(j9vm SHARED
-	OUTPUT_NAME j9vm${J9VM_VERSION_SUFFIX}
+
+set(interp_flags_to_remove) # list of flags removed when compiling the interpreter
+set(interp_new_flags) # flags to be added when compiling the interpreter
+
+# Note: the uma makefiles also specify this for pLinux, however it appears we no longer
+# support building the interpreter with xlc on linux
+if(OMR_ARCH_POWER AND OMR_OS_AIX)
+	if(OMR_TOOLCONFIG STREQUAL "xlc")
+		list(APPEND interp_flags_to_remove "-O3")
+		list(APPEND interp_new_flags "-O2" "-qdebug=lincomm:ptranl:tfbagg")
+		#[[

nodes.bodyText:
its the not often used cmake bracket comment
https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.18/manual/cmake-language.7.html#bracket-comment
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,23 +21,54 @@

+
+set(interp_flags_to_remove) # list of flags removed when compiling the interpreter

+
+# Note: the uma makefiles also specify this for pLinux, however it appears we no longer
+# support building the interpreter with xlc on linux
+if(OMR_ARCH_POWER AND OMR_OS_AIX)

+		list(APPEND interp_flags_to_remove "-O3")
+		list(APPEND interp_new_flags "-O2" "-qdebug=lincomm:ptranl:tfbagg")
+		#[[
